## createModalEventDispatcher() function

Helper that wraps svelte `createEventDispatcher` for creating typesafe event dispatcher from the `$$Events` type. See [ExtendedModalEvents](./modal.extendedmodalevents.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createModalEventDispatcher<
	Events extends ModalComponentBaseEvents<ModalComponentBaseResolved<ExtendedResolved>> &
		Record<string, CustomEvent<any>>,
	ExtendedResolved extends Record<string, any> = Omit<Events['resolve']['detail'], 'trigger'>,
>(): <EventKey extends Extract<keyof Events, string>>(
	type: EventKey,
	detail?: { [key in keyof Events]: Events[key]['detail'] }[EventKey] | undefined,
	options?: import('svelte/internal').DispatchOptions | undefined,
) => boolean;
```

**Returns:**

&lt;EventKey extends Extract&lt;keyof Events, string&gt;&gt;(type: EventKey, detail?: { \[key in keyof Events\]: Events\[key\]\["detail"\]; }\[EventKey\] \| undefined, options?: import("svelte/internal").DispatchOptions \| undefined) =&gt; boolean

svelte event dispatcher
